relationships.description: George is beaming and thumping Harry on the arm.
Fred is looking quizzically at Ron.
Hermione is cool and looks alarmed later when talking to Harry.
Ron mentions Ernie as coming over.
Hannah Abbott and Smith are mentioned as coming over together.
Smith is a member of the group of Ravenclaws.
